sentences.en: Don’t forget to send us a postcard!
sentences.cn: 别忘了给我们寄张明信片！

sentences.en: For more details about these products, send a postcard marked HB/FF.
sentences.cn: 要了解这些产品的详细信息，请寄来标明HB/FF字样的明信片。
昨天我买了一张明信片.

sentences.en: I got your postcard from the school.
sentences.cn: 你从学校寄来的明信片我已收到.

sentences.en: I'll tell mum about the postcard if you don't behave youself.
sentences.cn: 要是你不听话,我就马上告诉妈那张画片的事情.

sentences.en: It is forbidden to adjoin to a postcard any sample of merchandise.
sentences.cn: 在明信片上附贴商品的样品是不许可的.

sentences.en: It was very considerate of you to send me a postcard.
sentences.cn: 你想得真周到,寄给我明信片.

sentences.en: Mildred sent him a postcard to announce her safe arrival.
sentences.cn: 米尔维给他寄了一张明信片,报告她平安抵达了.

sentences.en: Print your name and address on a postcard and send it to us.
sentences.cn: 在明信片上用印刷体写上你的名字和地址，然后邮寄给我们。

sentences.en: Send a postcard to me when you arrive in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 你到上海以后给我发张明信片.

sentences.en: Send your answers on the back of a postcard.
sentences.cn: 将答案写在明信片背面寄出。

sentences.en: The army sent me a postcard acknowledging my request.
sentences.cn: 军队寄给我一张明信片告知我的申请书已收到。

sentences.en: The front of the postcard shows a picture of the Summer Palace.
sentences.cn: 明信片的正面是一幅颐和园的照片.

sentences.en: The wrinkled postcard now made me reconsider.
sentences.cn: 此刻这张打皱的明信片却促我重新扪心自问.

sentences.en: Tom mails Mary a postcard every year.
sentences.cn: 汤姆每年都寄给玛丽一张明信片.

sentences.en: We laughed over Jim's postcard from his seaside holiday.
sentences.cn: 我们笑谈着吉姆在海边度假时寄来的明信片.

trans.tran_en: a card that can be sent in the post without an envelope, especially one with a picture on it
